translations: 打盹，（尤指在白天）小睡（snooze 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: My brother was snoozing on the sofa.
sentences.translation: 我弟弟正在沙发上打盹。

sentences.sentence: Harry is behind the camcorder, panning over snoozing soldiers when he zooms in on the face of a Pakistani soldier, "Ah, our little Paki friend... Ahmed."
sentences.translation: 哈利拿着摄像机，镜头平扫过正在打盹的士兵时，他把焦点对准一名巴基斯坦士兵的脸，“啊，我们的小巴基斯坦朋友……艾哈迈德。”

sentences.sentence: The first is that if you have a dialog, execution happens only when the user closes the dialog, not when snoozing it.
sentences.translation: 第一种情况是如果您有一个对话，执行只在用户关闭对话时发生，打开期间不会发生。
